ground_truth: He smiles as he turns toward Rick. Suddenly the smile fades. In Rick's hand is a gun, which he levels at Renault. Renault halts for a moment and studies Rick. He walks to a table and sits. As Renault picks up the phone and dials, Rick takes back the letters. Strasser is on the phone. He hangs up the receiver and presses a buzzer on his desk. An officer quickly enters. He hangs up the receiver and, grabbing for his cap, hurriedly exits. The entire airport is surrounded by a heavy fog. The outline of the transport plane is barely visible. On the airfield a transport plane is being readied. A uniformed orderly uses a telephone near the hangar door. He hangs up and moves to a car that has just pulled up outside the hangar. Renault gets out while the orderly stands at attention. He's closely followed by Rick, right hand in the pocket of his trench coat, covering Renault with a gun. Laszlo and Ilsa emerge from the rear of the car. Laszlo and take care of his luggage. The orderly escorts Laszlo off in the direction of the plane. Rick takes the letters of transit out of his pocket and hands them to Renault, who turns and walks toward the hangar. Renault stops dead in his tracks, and turns around. Both Ilsa and Renault look at Rick with astonishment. Rick's intention suddenly dawns on Ilsa. Renault countersigns the papers. Ilsa's eyes well up with tears. Rick puts his hand to her chin and raises her face to meet his own. Major Strasser drives at break-neck speed towards the airport. He honks his horn furiously. Laszlo returns. Rick walks into the hangar and Renault hands him the letters. He walks back out to Laszlo. Rick hands the letters to Laszlo. Laszlo extends his hand to Rick, who grasps it firmly. On the airfield the airplane engine turns over and the propellers start turning. They all turn to see the plane readying for take-off. Ilsa looks at Rick and he returns her stare with a blank expression. He then glances at Laszlo, as does Ilsa. Then Laszlo breaks the silence. Rick watches as Ilsa and Laszlo walk very deliberately towards the plane. Rick puts a cigarette in his mouth. The door to the plane is closed by an attendant and it slowly taxies down the field. Suddenly a speeding car comes to a stop outside the hangar. Strasser alights from the car and runs toward Renault. Renault nods toward the field. Strasser turns to see the plane taxiing towards the runway. Strasser looks briefly at Rick, then makes a step towards the telephone just inside the hangar door. His eyes dart towards the telephone.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He grins as he rotates toward Rick. Abruptly the grin diminishes. In Rick's hand is a pistol, which he levels at Renault. Renault pauses for a moment and examines Rick. He strides to a table and sits. As Renault grabs the phone and dials, Rick retrieves the documents. Strasser is on the phone. He hangs up the receiver and activates a buzzer on his desk. An officer swiftly enters. He hangs up the receiver and, seizing his cap, rapidly departs. The complete airport is enveloped by a dense mist. The outline of the transport aircraft is scarcely visible. On the airfield a transport aircraft is being prepared. A uniformed attendant utilizes a telephone near the hangar door. He hangs up and moves to a vehicle that has just stopped outside the hangar. Renault exits while the attendant stands at attention. He's closely trailed by Rick, right hand in the pocket of his trench coat, covering Renault with a pistol. Laszlo and Ilsa emerge from the rear of the vehicle. Laszlo and handle his baggage. The attendant guides Laszlo off in the direction of the aircraft. Rick takes the documents of transit out of his pocket and hands them to Renault, who turns and walks toward the hangar. Renault stops dead in his tracks, and turns around. Both Ilsa and Renault look at Rick with amazement. Rick's aim suddenly dawns on Ilsa. Renault endorses the documents. Ilsa's eyes fill with tears. Rick puts his hand to her chin and raises her face to meet his own. Major Strasser speeds at break-neck velocity towards the airport. He honks his horn furiously. Laszlo returns. Rick walks into the hangar and Renault hands him the documents. He walks back out to Laszlo. Rick hands the documents to Laszlo. Laszlo extends his hand to Rick, who grips it firmly. On the airfield the airplane engine starts up and the propellers start rotating. They all turn to see the aircraft readying for take-off. Ilsa looks at Rick and he returns her gaze with a blank expression. He then glances at Laszlo, as does Ilsa. Then Laszlo breaks the silence. Rick watches as Ilsa and Laszlo walk very deliberately towards the aircraft. Rick puts a cigarette in his mouth. The door to the aircraft is closed by an attendant and it slowly taxies down the field. Suddenly a speeding vehicle comes to a stop outside the hangar. Strasser disembarks from the vehicle and runs toward Renault. Renault nods toward the field. Strasser turns to see the aircraft taxiing towards the runway. Strasser looks briefly at Rick, then makes a step towards the telephone just inside the hangar door. His eyes dart towards the telephone.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He smiles at Rick, but the smile fades as Rick holds a gun aimed at him. Renault pauses, studies Rick, and sits at a table to dial the phone. Rick retrieves the letters. Strasser is on the line, hangs up, and presses a buzzer, summoning an officer who exits quickly. The airport is shrouded in heavy fog, with only a faint outline of the transport plane visible on the airfield. A uniformed orderly uses a phone near the hangar, then moves to a car. Renault exits, followed by Rick, gun in hand. Laszlo and Ilsa emerge from the car, and the orderly escorts Laszlo to the plane. Rick hands the letters of transit to Renault, who countersigns them. Ilsa's eyes fill with tears as Rick reassures her. Strasser speeds to the airport, honking furiously. Laszlo returns, and Rick gives him the letters. Laszlo shakes Rick's hand. The airplane's engine starts and propellers turn. Ilsa and Rick exchange looks, then she and Laszlo head to the plane. Rick lights a cigarette as the plane doors close and it taxis. Strasser arrives in a hurry, nods at Renault, and turns to see the plane moving towards the runway, briefly glancing at Rick before moving towards the telephone.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Rick smiles at Renault, but the smile fades when he sees a gun. Renault stops and studies Rick, then sits at a table to call Strasser. Rick retrieves the letters as an officer enters, the airport shrouded in fog. As a plane is readied, Renault exits a car followed by Rick, gun in hand. Laszlo and Ilsa join, and the orderly takes Laszlo to the plane. Rick hands Renault the letters, who signs them before Ilsa realizes Rick's plan. Strasser speeds to the airport as Laszlo returns to receive the letters from Rick. They shake hands, and the plane prepares for take-off. Ilsa looks at Rick, and then at Laszlo, breaking the silence. Rick watches them board, lights a cigarette, and as the plane taxies, Strasser arrives, nods at Renault, then moves towards the phone.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: With a warm smile on his face, he turns his attention towards Rick. However, that friendly expression quickly dissolves into a more serious look. In Rick's hand, unmistakably, there is a gun, which he calmly levels in the direction of Renault. Renault comes to an abrupt halt for a brief moment, carefully studying Rick's demeanor. Then, he walks over to a nearby table and takes a seat. While Renault picks up the phone, methodically dialing, Rick deftly retrieves the letters. On the line is Strasser. After their call concludes, Strasser decisively hangs up the receiver and promptly presses a buzzer located on his desk. In response, an officer swiftly enters the room. Strasser hangs up and, without delay, grabs for his cap and makes a hasty exit. Outside, a thick, impenetrable fog envelops the entire airport, and the silhouette of the transport plane is barely discernible through the mist. On the airfield, preparations are underway for the transport plane's departure. A uniformed orderly stands by, using a telephone positioned near the hangar door. Completing his call, he hangs up and moves over to a car that has just drawn up outside the hangar. Renault steps out of the car while the orderly springs to attention. Closely following Renault is Rick, with his right hand nestled in the pocket of his trench coat, keeping Renault covered with a gun. Laszlo and Ilsa emerge from the rear of the vehicle. Laszlo proceeds to handle his luggage, and the orderly dutifully escorts him in the direction of the waiting plane. Rick, meanwhile, retrieves the letters of transit from his pocket and hands them over to Renault, who turns and heads towards the hangar. Suddenly, Renault comes to an abrupt stop, spinning around in surprise. Both Ilsa and Renault gaze at Rick, their faces reflecting astonishment. In that moment, Rick's intention becomes crystal clear to Ilsa. Renault, acknowledging the situation, countersigns the papers. Tears begin to glisten in Ilsa's eyes as Rick gently lifts her chin with his hand, raising her face to meet his own gaze. Meanwhile, Major Strasser speeds furiously towards the airport in his car, honking the horn with urgency. Laszlo returns from his task, and Rick steps into the hangar where Renault hands him the letters once more. Rick then walks back out to meet Laszlo, handing the letters over to him. Laszlo extends his hand towards Rick, who grips it firmly in a gesture of mutual respect. On the airfield, the airplane's engine roars to life, and the propellers start to spin. Everyone turns their attention to the plane, now readying for take-off. Ilsa gives Rick a meaningful look, to which he responds with a distant, expressionless stare. Then, he shifts his glance towards Laszlo, and Ilsa follows suit. Breaking the silence, Laszlo speaks. Rick watches intently as Ilsa and Laszlo walk purposefully towards the waiting plane. Calmly, Rick places a cigarette in his mouth. An attendant closes the door to the aircraft, and it begins to slowly taxi down the field. Abruptly, a speeding car screeches to a stop outside the hangar. Strasser emerges from the vehicle, running urgently towards Renault. Renault nods knowingly in the direction of the field, prompting Strasser to turn and see the plane making its way towards the runway. Strasser briefly glances at Rick before making a move towards the telephone positioned just inside the hangar door, his gaze focused intently on the device.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: With a warm and inviting smile stretched across his face, he momentarily focuses his attention towards Rick. However, that friendly expression rapidly vanishes, giving way to a much more serious look. In Rick's hand, quite unmistakably, there is a gun that he calmly levels in the direction of Renault. Renault comes to an abrupt pause for a brief moment, carefully analyzing Rick's demeanor. Then, with deliberate steps, he walks over to a table nearby and takes a seat. While Renault picks up the phone, methodically dialing each number with precision, Rick deftly retrieves the letters. On the other end of the line is Strasser. After their conversation concludes, Strasser decisively hangs up the receiver and promptly presses a buzzer located conveniently on his desk. In response, an officer swiftly enters the room with urgency. Strasser finishes the call and, without delay, grabs for his cap and makes a hasty exit. Outside, a thick, impenetrable fog envelops the entire airport, and the silhouette of the transport plane is barely discernible through the heavy mist. On the airfield, thoughtful preparations are underway for the transport plane's impending departure. A uniformed orderly stands by, using a telephone positioned near the hangar door. After completing his call, he hangs up and moves over to a car that has just drawn up outside the hangar. Renault steps out of the car while the orderly springs to attention immediately. Closely following Renault is Rick, with his right hand nestled securely in the pocket of his trench coat, ensuring Renault remains covered with the gun. Laszlo and Ilsa then emerge from the rear of the vehicle. Laszlo proceeds to manage his luggage, and the orderly dutifully escorts him in the direction of the patiently waiting plane. Meanwhile, Rick retrieves the letters of transit from his pocket and hands them over to Renault, who then turns and heads towards the hangar. Suddenly, Renault comes to an abrupt stop, spinning around in surprise. Both Ilsa and Renault gaze at Rick, their faces reflecting pure astonishment. In that moment, Rick's intention becomes crystal clear to Ilsa. Acknowledging the gravity of the situation, Renault countersigns the papers. Tears begin to glisten in Ilsa's eyes as Rick gently lifts her chin with his hand, raising her face to meet his own gaze. Meanwhile, Major Strasser speeds furiously towards the airport in his car, honking the horn with a sense of urgency. Laszlo returns from his task, and Rick steps inside the hangar where Renault hands him the letters once more. Rick then walks back out to meet Laszlo, handing the letters over to him. Laszlo extends his hand towards Rick, who grips it firmly, sealing their farewell in a gesture of mutual respect. Out on the airfield, the airplane's engine roars to life, and the propellers start to spin with anticipation. Everyone turns their attention to the plane, now busily readying for take-off. Ilsa gives Rick a meaningful and lingering look, to which he responds with a distant, expressionless stare. Then, he shifts his glance towards Laszlo, and Ilsa follows suit with her gaze. Breaking the silence that envelops them, Laszlo speaks. Rick watches intently as Ilsa and Laszlo walk purposefully towards the waiting plane. With a calm demeanor, Rick places a cigarette in his mouth. An attendant closes the door to the aircraft, and it begins to slowly taxi down the field. Abruptly, a speeding car screeches to a stop outside the hangar, arresting the quiet of the night. Strasser emerges from the vehicle, running urgently towards Renault. Renault nods knowingly in the direction of the field, prompting Strasser to turn and see the plane making its way determinedly towards the runway. Strasser briefly glances at Rick before making a decisive move towards the telephone positioned just inside the hangar door, his gaze focused intently and determinedly on the device.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As he finds himself in the presence of Rick, he initially smiles warmly, only for his expression to abruptly shift into one of concern as he notices the firearm Rick is holding with a steady hand aimed directly at him. Renault, caught off guard, hesitates briefly, his mind racing as he assesses the situation. Gathering himself, he strides over to a nearby table and lowers himself into a chair. Reaching for the phone with deliberate intent, Renault begins to dial while Rick deftly retrieves the letters from their previous location. Meanwhile, Strasser, engaged in his own conversation, places the receiver down with a decisive click and activates a buzzer on his desk, setting off a series of events. Responding to the signal, an officer promptly appears but, after a brief exchange, hangs up his own phone amid the urgency and dashes off, grabbing his cap as he makes his swift exit. Outside, the airport is enveloped in a dense fog, concealing much of its surroundings, and only the faint silhouette of a transport plane can be discerned through the mist. On the field, preparations are underway for the plane's departure, including a uniformed orderly stationed by the telephone near the hangar door. After concluding his call, the orderly briskly approaches a newly arrived car outside the hangar. Renault steps out of the vehicle with a commanding presence, prompting the orderly to stand at attention. Not far behind, Rick emerges, his right hand nestled in the pocket of his trench coat, maintaining a cautious yet firm hold on Renault with his concealed gun. Laszlo and Ilsa appear from the back of the car, with Laszlo tending to their luggage. The orderly diligently guides Laszlo towards the waiting aircraft. Rick, meanwhile, retrieves the letters of transit from his pocket and passes them to Renault. With focused determination, Renault heads towards the hangar, only to pause abruptly, turning back to face Rick and Ilsa, both startled by the unexpected turn of events. Recognition of Rick's intentions dawns on Ilsa, stirring a profound emotional response. Renault, in a moment of clarity, countersigns the documents, while tears begin to pool in Ilsa's eyes. Rick tenderly places his hand beneath her chin, gently lifting her face until their eyes meet. In the meantime, Major Strasser speeds furiously towards the airport, his horn blaring insistently. As Laszlo returns, Rick steps into the hangar where Renault hands over the letters. Rick promptly exits to rejoin Laszlo, extending the letters to him. Laszlo, filled with gratitude, offers his hand to Rick, who accepts it with a firm and meaningful handshake. As the airplane engine roars to life and the propellers begin to spin, their attention collectively shifts to the plane, now poised for departure. In that charged moment, Ilsa gazes at Rick, who meets her look with an unreadable expression before diverting his gaze towards Laszlo, a gesture mirrored by Ilsa. With a sudden resolve, Laszlo breaks the silence, prompting Rick to watch as Ilsa and Laszlo proceed with purpose toward the awaiting plane. Rick places a cigarette between his lips, contemplating the unfolding scene. As the plane door is securely shut and it begins to roll away across the airfield, the screeching halt of an arriving car cuts through the air. Strasser leaps from the vehicle, dashing towards Renault as tension hangs thickly in the air. Sensing the urgency, Renault nods meaningfully in the direction of the airfield. Strasser, compelled to act, turns to witness the plane advancing steadily towards the runway. Momentarily locking eyes with Rick, Strasser takes a decisive step towards the telephone just inside the hangar entryway, his resolve mirrored in the sharp, darting movements of his eyes.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Rick's smile fades as he turns to see Rick holding a gun aimed at him, halting momentarily before heading to a table to sit. As Renault uses the phone to call Strasser, Rick retrieves the letters of transit. Strasser, after his call, summons an officer who quickly exits. Meanwhile, heavy fog envelops the airport, obscuring the transport plane being readied nearby. A uniformed orderly, after making a phone call, approaches a car that arrives outside the hangar. Renault steps out, followed by Rick, his hand concealing a gun in his trench coat pocket, covering Renault. Laszlo and Ilsa exit the car, and the orderly assists Laszlo with his luggage toward the plane. Rick hands the letters of transit to Renault, whose surprised reaction alerts Ilsa to Rick’s intentions. Renault countersigns the papers, causing Ilsa to tear up as Rick gently lifts her chin, meeting her gaze. Major Strasser speeds towards the airport, honking furiously. Once Laszlo returns, Rick retrieves the letters from Renault, hands them to Laszlo, and they shake hands firmly. The plane's engines start as everyone watches it ready for take-off. Ilsa exchanges glances with Rick, who remains expressionless, then with Laszlo. Breaking the silence, Laszlo and Ilsa walk deliberately toward the plane. Rick lights a cigarette, watching as the plane's door is closed and it begins to taxi. Suddenly, a speeding car arrives outside the hangar, and Strasser, emerging quickly, runs towards Renault. Renault subtly indicates the field, prompting Strasser to see the plane moving toward the runway. Strasser briefly glances at Rick before turning toward the phone by the hangar door.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He smiles as he turns toward Rick. Suddenly the smile fades. In Rick's hand is a gun, a German Luger known for its reliability during World War II, which he levels at Renault. Renault halts for a moment and studies Rick. He walks to a table and sits. As Renault picks up the phone, an older rotary model commonly found in the 1940s, and dials, Rick takes back the letters. Strasser is on the phone, a high-ranking officer known for his unwavering allegiance to his orders. He hangs up the receiver and presses a buzzer on his desk. An officer quickly enters, dressed in the standard military police uniform. He hangs up the receiver and, grabbing for his cap, hurriedly exits. The entire airport, situated on the outskirts of Casablanca with minimal infrastructure, is surrounded by a heavy fog. The outline of the transport plane, a Lockheed C-47 Skytrain used extensively during the war, is barely visible. On the airfield, a transport plane is being readied. A uniformed orderly uses a telephone near the hangar door, part of the military communication network. He hangs up and moves to a car that has just pulled up outside the hangar, a classic black sedan typical of the era's official vehicles. Renault gets out while the orderly stands at attention. He's closely followed by Rick, right hand in the pocket of his trench coat, covering Renault with a gun. Laszlo, a well-known resistance leader, and Ilsa emerge from the rear of the car. The orderly escorts Laszlo, aiding him in discreetly escaping occupied territory, off in the direction of the plane. Rick takes the letters of transit, crucial documents granting safe passage that were highly sought after during the wartime period, out of his pocket and hands them to Renault, who turns and walks toward the hangar. Renault stops dead in his tracks and turns around. Both Ilsa and Renault look at Rick with astonishment. Rick's intention suddenly dawns on Ilsa. Renault countersigns the papers, officially authorizing Laszlo's departure. Ilsa's eyes well up with tears. Rick puts his hand to her chin and raises her face, echoing a gesture filled with unspoken emotion, to meet his own. Major Strasser drives at break-neck speed towards the airport, maneuvering through the unlit roads, and honks his horn furiously. Laszlo returns. Rick walks into the hangar and Renault hands him the letters. He walks back out to Laszlo. Rick hands the letters to Laszlo, completing their escape plan. Laszlo extends his hand to Rick, who grasps it firmly, a silent acknowledgment of mutual respect and sacrifice. On the airfield, the airplane engine turns over and the propellers start turning, the noise cutting through the dense fog. They all turn to see the plane readying for take-off, the finality of their departure looming. Ilsa looks at Rick and he returns her stare with a blank expression, hiding the myriad emotions beneath. He then glances at Laszlo, as does Ilsa. Then Laszlo breaks the silence, offering words of gratitude. Rick watches as Ilsa and Laszlo walk very deliberately towards the plane, every step a goodbye. Rick puts a cigarette in his mouth, seeking solace in the familiar habit. The door to the plane is closed by an attendant and it slowly taxies down the field, the hum of the engines growing distant. Suddenly a speeding car comes to a stop outside the hangar. Strasser alights from the car, urgency in his stride, and runs toward Renault. Renault nods toward the field, signaling the futility of pursuit. Strasser turns to see the plane taxiing towards the runway, the realization of his failure dawning. Strasser looks briefly at Rick, then makes a step towards the telephone just inside the hangar door, desperation in his movements. His eyes dart towards the telephone, his last chance to assert control slipping away.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. Renault countersigns the papers. Ilsa's eyes well up with tears. Rick puts his hand to her chin and raises her face to meet his own. Major. Strasser drives at breakneck speed towards the airport. He honks his horn furiously. Laszlo returns. Rick walks into the hangar and Renault hands him the letters. He walks back out to Laszlo. Rick hands the letters to Laszlo. Laszlo extends his hand to Rick who grasps it firmly. On the airfield the airplane engine turns over and the propellers start turning. They all turn to see the plane readying for takeoff. Ilsa looks at Rick and he returns her stare with a blank expression. He then glances at Laszlo as does Ilsa. Then Laszlo breaks the silence. Rick watches as Ilsa and Laszlo walk very deliberately towards the plane. Rick puts a cigarette in his mouth. The door to the plane is closed by an attendant and it slowly taxies down the field. Suddenly a speeding car comes to a stop outside the hangar. Strasser alights from the car and runs toward Renault. Renault nods toward the field. Strasser turns to see the plane taxiing towards the runway. Strasser looks briefly at Rick then makes a step towards the telephone just inside the hangar door. His eyes dart towards the telephone.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: He smiles as he turns toward Rick. Suddenly the smile fades. In Rick's hand is a gun which he levels at Renault. Renault halts for a moment and studies Rick. He walks to a table and sits. As Renault picks up the phone and dials Rick takes back the letters. Strasser is on the phone. He hangs up the receiver and presses a buzzer on his desk. An officer quickly enters. He hangs up the receiver and grabbing for his cap hurriedly exits. The entire airport is surrounded by a heavy fog. The outline of the transport plane is barely visible. On the airfield a transport plane is being readied. A uniformed orderly uses a telephone near the hangar door. He hangs up and moves to a car that has just pulled up outside the hangar. Renault gets out while the orderly stands at attention. He is closely followed by Rick right hand in the pocket of his trench coat covering Renault with a gun. Laszlo and Ilsa emerge from the rear of the car. Laszlo and take care of his luggage. The orderly escorts Laszlo off in the direction of the plane. Rick takes the letters of transit out of his pocket and hands them to Renault who turns and walks toward the hangar. Renault stops dead in his tracks and turns around. Both Ilsa and Renault look at Rick with astonishment. Rick's intention suddenly dawns on Ilsa. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: The dog smiles as it turns toward the parrot. Suddenly the smile fades. In the parrot's hand is a gun, which it levels at the giraffe. The giraffe halts for a moment and studies the parrot. The cat walks to a table and sits. As the giraffe picks up the phone and dials, the parrot takes back the letters. The elephant is on the phone. It hangs up the receiver and presses a buzzer on its desk. A squirrel quickly enters. It hangs up the receiver and, grabbing for its cap, hurriedly exits. The entire airport is surrounded by a heavy fog. The outline of the transport plane is barely visible. On the airfield a transport plane is being readied. A uniformed hamster uses a telephone near the hangar door. The hamster hangs up and moves to a car that has just pulled up outside the hangar. The giraffe gets out while the hamster stands at attention. It's closely followed by the parrot, right hand in the pocket of its trench coat, covering the giraffe with a gun. The kangaroo and owl emerge from the rear of the car. The kangaroo and take care of its luggage. The hamster escorts the kangaroo off in the direction of the plane. The parrot takes the letters of transit out of its pocket and hands them to the giraffe, who turns and walks toward the hangar. The giraffe stops dead in its tracks, and turns around. Both the owl and the giraffe look at the parrot with astonishment. The parrot's intention suddenly dawns on the owl. The giraffe countersigns the papers. The owl's eyes well up with tears. The parrot puts its hand to the owl's chin and raises its face to meet its own. The lion drives at break-neck speed towards the airport. It honks its horn furiously. The kangaroo returns. The parrot walks into the hangar and the giraffe hands it the letters. The parrot walks back out to the kangaroo. The parrot hands the letters to the kangaroo. The kangaroo extends its hand to the parrot, who grasps it firmly. On the airfield the airplane engine turns over and the propellers start turning. They all turn to see the plane readying for take-off. The owl looks at the parrot and it returns her stare with a blank expression. It then glances at the kangaroo, as does the owl. Then the kangaroo breaks the silence. The parrot watches as the owl and the kangaroo walk very deliberately towards the plane. The parrot puts a cigarette in its mouth. The door to the plane is closed by an attendant and it slowly taxies down the field. Suddenly a speeding car comes to a stop outside the hangar. The lion alights from the car and runs toward the giraffe. The giraffe nods toward the field. The lion turns to see the plane taxiing towards the runway. The lion looks briefly at the parrot, then makes a step towards the telephone just inside the hangar door. Its eyes dart towards the telephone.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: He smiles as he turns toward Rick. Suddenly the smile fades. In Rick's hand is a bouquet, which he levels at Renault. Renault halts for a moment and studies Rick. He walks to an easel and sits. As Renault picks up the paintbrush and dabs, Rick takes back the envelopes. Strasser is on the canvas. He hangs up the palette and presses a button on his chair. A librarian quickly enters. He hangs up the palette and, grabbing for his book, hurriedly exits. The entire playground is surrounded by a heavy mist. The outline of the trolley is barely visible. On the lawn, a trolley is being readied. A uniformed conductor uses a megaphone near the gazebo door. He hangs up and moves to a bicycle that has just pulled up outside the gazebo. Renault gets out while the conductor stands at ease. He's closely followed by Rick, right hand in the pocket of his raincoat, covering Renault with a bouquet. Laszlo and Ilsa emerge from the sidecar of the bicycle. Laszlo goes to take care of his suitcase. The conductor escorts Laszlo off in the direction of the trolley. Rick takes the postcards out of his pocket and hands them to Renault, who turns and walks toward the gazebo. Renault stops dead in his tracks, and turns around. Both Ilsa and Renault look at Rick with astonishment. Rick's intention suddenly dawns on Ilsa. Renault countersigns the pamphlets. Ilsa's eyes well up with tears. Rick puts his hand to her chin and raises her face to meet his own. Major Strasser pedals at break-neck speed towards the playground. He rings his bell furiously. Laszlo returns. Rick walks into the gazebo and Renault hands him the postcards. He walks back out to Laszlo. Rick hands the postcards to Laszlo. Laszlo extends his hand to Rick, who grasps it firmly. On the lawn, the carousel engine turns over and the horses start turning. They all turn to see the carousel readying for the ride. Ilsa looks at Rick and he returns her stare with a blank expression. He then glances at Laszlo, as does Ilsa. Then Laszlo breaks the silence. Rick watches as Ilsa and Laszlo walk very deliberately towards the carousel. Rick puts a lollipop in his mouth. The entrance to the carousel is closed by an attendant and it slowly spins down the lawn. Suddenly a speeding unicycle comes to a stop outside the gazebo. Strasser alights from the unicycle and runs toward Renault. Renault nods toward the lawn. Strasser turns to see the carousel spinning towards the gate. Strasser looks briefly at Rick, then makes a step towards the register just inside the gazebo door. His eyes dart towards the register.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He frowns as he spins toward Rick. Suddenly the frown deepens. In Rick's hand is a gun, which he points at Renault. Renault pauses for a moment and observes Rick. He strides to a table and reclines. As Renault lifts the phone and punches in numbers, Rick retrieves the letters. Strasser is on the phone. He replaces the receiver and taps a buzzer on his desk. An officer swiftly enters. He replaces the receiver and, seizing his cap, quickly departs. The entire airport is shrouded by a thick mist. The silhouette of the transport plane is scarcely visible. On the airfield a transport plane is being checked. A uniformed orderly operates a telephone near the hangar door. He puts down the phone and strides to a car that has just stopped outside the hangar. Renault steps out while the orderly remains at attention. He's followed closely by Rick, right hand in the pocket of his trench coat, covering Renault with a gun. Laszlo and Ilsa appear from the rear of the car. Laszlo and see to his luggage. The orderly guides Laszlo off in the direction of the plane. Rick extracts the letters of transit out of his pocket and presents them to Renault, who turns and advances toward the hangar. Renault freezes in his tracks, and pivots around. Both Ilsa and Renault gaze at Rick with amazement. Rick's plan suddenly becomes clear to Ilsa. Renault signs the papers. Ilsa's eyes fill with tears. Rick places his hand on her chin and lifts her face to meet his own. Major Strasser speeds at a dangerous pace towards the airport. He blares his horn angrily. Laszlo returns. Rick marches into the hangar and Renault hands him the letters. He strides back out to Laszlo. Rick presents the letters to Laszlo. Laszlo reaches his hand to Rick, who clasps it tightly. On the airfield the airplane engine revs up and the propellers begin spinning. They all turn to see the plane preparing for take-off. Ilsa glances at Rick and he meets her gaze with a blank look. He then looks at Laszlo, as does Ilsa. Then Laszlo interrupts the silence. Rick observes as Ilsa and Laszlo walk purposefully towards the plane. Rick lights a cigarette. The door to the plane is fastened by an attendant and it slowly rolls down the field. Suddenly a speeding car skids to a halt outside the hangar. Strasser disembarks from the car and rushes toward Renault. Renault gestures toward the field. Strasser turns to see the plane rolling towards the runway. Strasser glances briefly at Rick, then takes a step towards the telephone just inside the hangar door. His gaze darts towards the telephone.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The mailbox grins as it pivots toward the sunflower. Suddenly the grin vanishes. In the sunflower's paw is a violin, which it points at the bookcase. The bookcase pauses for a moment and examines the sunflower. It strolls to a window and perches. As the bookcase picks up the drum and taps, the sunflower retrieves the newspapers. The giraffe is on the drum. It hangs up the spoon and presses a whistle on its shelf. A penguin swiftly enters. It hangs up the spoon and, grabbing for its scarf, quickly departs. The entire garden is enveloped by a dense mist. The silhouette of the bicycle is hardly distinguishable. On the patio a bicycle is being prepared. A decorated lamp uses a megaphone near the garage gate. It hangs up and moves to a skateboard that has just arrived outside the garage. The bookcase hops out while the lamp stands at attention. It's closely followed by the sunflower, right paw in the pocket of its raincoat, covering the bookcase with a violin. The apple and the suitcase emerge from the back of the skateboard. The apple and manage its backpack. The lamp accompanies the apple off in the direction of the bicycle. The sunflower takes the newspapers from its pocket and hands them to the bookcase, which turns and walks toward the garage. The bookcase freezes and turns around. Both the suitcase and the bookcase gaze at the sunflower with surprise. The sunflower's purpose suddenly becomes clear to the suitcase. The bookcase endorses the documents. The suitcase's eyes fill with rain. The sunflower touches its paw to its nose and raises its face to meet its own. The zebra races at break-neck speed towards the garden. It blares its trombone madly. The apple reappears. The sunflower strides into the garage and the bookcase hands it the newspapers. It strolls back out to the apple. The sunflower hands the newspapers to the apple. The apple extends its wing to the sunflower, who grasps it tightly. On the patio the skateboard engine rumbles and the wheels start spinning. They all turn to see the skateboard preparing for departure. The suitcase glances at the sunflower and it returns its gaze with a vacant look. It then glances at the apple, as does the suitcase. Then the apple breaks the stillness. The sunflower observes as the suitcase and the apple march purposefully toward the skateboard. The sunflower places a pencil in its beak. The door to the skateboard is closed by a gardener and it gradually moves down the path. Suddenly a racing canoe comes to a halt outside the garage. The giraffe dismounts from the canoe and sprints toward the bookcase. The bookcase nods toward the path. The giraffe turns to see the skateboard moving toward the track. The giraffe briefly glances at the sunflower, then steps toward the xylophone just inside the garage gate. Its eyes flick toward the xylophone.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He grins as he pivots toward Carl. Abruptly, the grin vanishes. In Carl's hand is a flashlight, which he directs at Louis. Louis pauses for a moment and observes Carl. He strides to a chair and reclines. As Louis lifts the telephone and taps in a number, Carl retrieves the envelopes. Hugo is on the line. He disconnects the call and taps a button on his console. A sergeant swiftly appears. He disconnects the call and, reaching for his gloves, swiftly departs. The entire terminal is enveloped by a thick mist. The silhouette of the cargo plane is scarcely perceptible. On the tarmac, a cargo plane is being prepared. A uniformed technician operates a radio near the hangar entrance. He disconnects and approaches a jeep that has just parked outside the hangar. Louis steps out as the technician stands at ease. He's immediately followed by Carl, left hand in the pocket of his leather jacket, holding Louis at bay with a flashlight. Victor and Anna emerge from the back of the jeep. Victor and manage his equipment. The technician guides Victor away in the direction of the aircraft. Carl retrieves the travel permits from his pocket and passes them to Louis, who pivots and heads toward the hangar. Louis abruptly stops, and spins around. Both Anna and Louis gaze at Carl with surprise. Carl's plan suddenly becomes clear to Anna. Louis endorses the documents. Anna's eyes fill with water. Carl touches her shoulder and lifts her gaze to meet his own. Captain Hugo races frantically towards the terminal. He blasts his horn relentlessly. Victor returns. Carl steps into the hangar and Louis passes him the envelopes. He steps back out to Victor. Carl passes the envelopes to Victor. Victor offers his hand to Carl, who clasps it tightly. On the tarmac, the aircraft engine ignites and the propellers begin to whirl. They all turn to witness the aircraft preparing for departure. Anna glances at Carl and he returns her look with an unreadable expression. He then shifts his gaze to Victor, as does Anna. Then Victor breaks the silence. Carl watches as Anna and Victor stroll very intentionally towards the aircraft. Carl places a pen in his mouth. The door to the aircraft is sealed by a steward and it gradually moves down the strip. Suddenly a racing vehicle halts outside the hangar. Hugo descends from the vehicle and dashes toward Louis. Louis gestures toward the strip. Hugo turns to witness the aircraft moving towards the runway. Hugo glances briefly at Carl, then makes a motion towards the radio just inside the hangar entrance. His eyes flicker towards the radio.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He grins as he pivots toward Rick. Suddenly the grin disappears. In Rick's hand is a flower, which he waves at Renault. Renault pauses for a moment and examines Rick. He heads to a chair and reclines. As Renault picks up the book and reads, Rick snatches back the tickets. Strasser is on the intercom. He switches off the speaker and taps a drum on his desk. A messenger quickly arrives. He switches off the speaker and, reaching for his glasses, leisurely leaves. The entire beach is engulfed by a thick mist. The outline of the sailboat is barely discernible. On the dock, a sailboat is being prepared. A uniformed servant uses a typewriter near the boathouse door. He types a message and moves to a bicycle that has just rolled up outside the boathouse. Renault jumps off while the servant stands at ease. He's closely followed by Rick, right hand in the pocket of his jacket, shadowing Renault with a flower. Laszlo and Ilsa step out from the rear of the bicycle. Laszlo and take care of his backpack. The servant guides Laszlo off in the direction of the boat. Rick extracts the tickets from his pocket and offers them to Renault, who pivots and strides toward the boathouse. Renault freezes in his path and spins around. Both Ilsa and Renault gaze at Rick in disbelief. Rick's plan suddenly becomes clear to Ilsa. Renault stamps the documents. Ilsa's eyes fill with laughter. Rick puts his hand to her forehead and tilts her head to meet his own. Major Strasser cycles at a reckless pace towards the beach. He rings his bell loudly. Laszlo returns. Rick strolls into the boathouse and Renault gives him the tickets. He strolls back out to Laszlo. Rick hands the tickets to Laszlo. Laszlo offers his hand to Rick, who clasps it gently. On the dock, the boat engine purrs and the sails begin unfurling. They all turn to see the boat readying for departure. Ilsa gazes at Rick, and he returns her gaze with a neutral look. He then peeks at Laszlo, as does Ilsa. Then Laszlo breaks the silence. Rick observes as Ilsa and Laszlo promenade very intentionally towards the boat. Rick puts a lollipop in his mouth. The door to the boat is closed by a sailor and it slowly drifts down the pier. Suddenly a speeding bicycle screeches to a halt outside the boathouse. Strasser dismounts from the bicycle and jogs toward Renault. Renault gestures toward the pier. Strasser rotates to see the boat drifting towards the ocean. Strasser glances briefly at Rick, then takes a step towards the typewriter just inside the boathouse door. His gaze flickers towards the typewriter.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: He giggles as he spins toward Sam. Suddenly the giggle disappears. In Sam's hand is a banana, which he points at Jackson. Jackson pauses for a second and examines Sam. He strolls to a bench and lounges. As Jackson grabs the hammer and taps, Sam retrieves the maps. Peterson is on the radio. He clicks off the microphone and pushes a button on his chair. A firefighter swiftly enters. He clicks off the microphone and, clutching for his helmet, rapidly departs. The entire dock is enveloped by a thick mist. The silhouette of the cargo ship is scarcely discernible. On the tarmac, a cargo ship is being serviced. A uniformed nurse uses a megaphone beside the hangar window. She clicks off and advances to a truck that has just arrived outside the hangar. Jackson climbs out while the nurse stands formally. He's closely followed by Sam, right hand in the pocket of his raincoat, covering Jackson with a banana. Morgan and Jane appear from the back of the truck. Morgan and handle his parcels. The nurse guides Morgan away in the direction of the ship. Sam extracts the maps out of his pocket and hands them to Jackson, who turns and strolls toward the hangar. Jackson freezes, and spins around. Both Jane and Jackson gaze at Sam with disbelief. Sam's plan abruptly reveals itself to Jane. Jackson endorses the documents. Jane's eyes fill with raindrops. Sam places his hand to her cheek and tilts her face to meet his own. Captain Peterson races at lightning speed towards the dock. He blares his horn frantically. Morgan comes back. Sam strides into the hangar and Jackson presents him with the maps. He strides back out to Morgan. Sam hands the maps to Morgan. Morgan stretches his hand toward Sam, who grips it tightly. On the tarmac, the ship's engine whirs and the propellers begin spinning. They all turn to observe the ship preparing for departure. Jane gazes at Sam and he returns her gaze with a vacant expression. He then peeks at Morgan, as does Jane. Then Morgan breaks the quiet. Sam observes as Jane and Morgan stride very intentionally toward the ship. Sam places a lollipop in his mouth. The door to the ship is shut by a mechanic and it slowly cruises down the dock. Suddenly a racing boat halts outside the hangar. Peterson descends from the boat and dashes toward Jackson. Jackson gestures toward the dock. Peterson turns to see the ship cruising toward the channel. Peterson glances briefly at Sam, then takes a step toward the megaphone just inside the hangar window. His eyes flicker toward the megaphone.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Rick faces Renault with a gun, taking back some letters. As the airport is surrounded by fog, Renault arrives with Rick, who still covers him with the weapon. Laszlo and Ilsa exit a car, and the orderly escorts Laszlo to the plane. Rick gives Renault the letters of transit, and Renault countersigns them, surprising Ilsa. Major Strasser races to the airport, and as Rick hands the letters to Laszlo, the plane's engines start. Ilsa and Laszlo move toward the plane, and Rick watches with a blank expression. Strasser arrives just as the plane begins taxiing, glancing at the scene and moving towards the telephone, uncertain of his next action.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: His eyes dart towards the telephone Strasser looks briefly at Rick then makes a step towards the telephone just inside the hangar door Strasser turns to see the plane taxiing towards the runway Renault nods toward the field Strasser alights from the car and runs toward Renault Suddenly a speeding car comes to a stop outside the hangar The door to the plane is closed by an attendant and it slowly taxies down the field Rick puts a cigarette in his mouth Rick watches as Ilsa and Laszlo walk very deliberately towards the plane Then Laszlo breaks the silence He then glances at Laszlo as does Ilsa Ilsa looks at Rick and he returns her stare with a blank expression They all turn to see the plane readying for takeoff On the airfield the airplane engine turns over and the propellers start turning Laszlo extends his hand to Rick who grasps it firmly Rick hands the letters to Laszlo He walks back out to Laszlo Rick walks into the hangar and Renault hands him the letters Laszlo returns He honks his horn furiously Strasser drives at breakneck speed towards the airport Major Rick puts his hand to her chin and raises her face to meet his own Ilsa's eyes well up with tears Renault countersigns the papers Rick's intention suddenly dawns on Ilsa Both Ilsa and Renault look at Rick with astonishment Renault stops dead in his tracks and turns around Rick takes the letters of transit out of his pocket and hands them to Renault who turns and walks toward the hangar The orderly escorts Laszlo off in the direction of the plane Laszlo and take care of his luggage Laszlo and Ilsa emerge from the rear of the car He is closely followed by Rick right hand in the pocket of his trench coat covering Renault with a gun Renault gets out while the orderly stands at attention He hangs up and moves to a car that has just pulled up outside the hangar A uniformed orderly uses a telephone near the hangar door On the airfield a transport plane is being readied The outline of the transport plane is barely visible The entire airport is surrounded by a heavy fog He hangs up the receiver and grabbing for his cap hurriedly exits An officer quickly enters He hangs up the receiver and presses a buzzer on his desk Strasser is on the phone As Renault picks up the phone and dials Rick takes back the letters He walks to a table and sits Renault halts for a moment and studies Rick In Rick's hand is a gun which he levels at Renault Suddenly the smile fades He smiles as he turns toward Rick
